snippet: Boylesque, a male twist on the neo-burlesque movement, seems to be having its moment in New York night life.
abstract: Boylesque, male version of burlesque, seems to be having its moment in New York night life; established roster of boylesque professionals are celebrating the art form in performances and in a yearly festival.
lead_paragraph: Boylesque, a male twist on the neo-burlesque movement, seems to be having its moment in New York night life.

headline.seo: Boylesque, a Male Spin on the Classic Striptease
headline.main: But Gypsy Rose Lee Never Had a 5 O’Clock Shadow
headline.print_headline: But Gypsy Rose Lee Never Had a 5 O’Clock Shadow
